name: Healthyfied Soy Veggies
description: Indulge in a high-fiber, healthified feast with our Healthyfied Soy Veggies. Packed with the fresh and vibrant flavors of broccoli, cauliflower, French beans, and more, this recipe is a testament to healthy eating without compromising on taste. Perfect for anyone looking to enjoy healthy recipes that are as nourishing as they are delicious.
recipeIngredient: 1  pat (1 inch sq, 1/2 inch high), Butter, unsalted

recipeInstructions.text: Slice the red bell pepper, chop the garlic and red onion, and cut the green cabbage, carrots, and baby corn into bite-sized pieces.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 1

recipeInstructions.text: Trim the broccoli and cauliflower into small florets and slice the French beans.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: In a large pan, melt the butter over medium heat.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 3

recipeInstructions.text: Add the chopped garlic and onion to the pan, and saut√© for about 3 minutes, or until they start to soften.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4

recipeInstructions.text: Add the broccoli, cauliflower, French beans, red bell pepper, green cabbage, carrots, and baby corn to the pan. Stir well to combine.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 5

recipeInstructions.text: Cook the vegetables for about 10 minutes, stirring occasionally, until they are tender but still crisp.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 6

recipeInstructions.text: Sprinkle the stevia, ground black pepper, and soy sauce over the vegetables. Stir well to ensure the vegetables are evenly coated.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 7

recipeInstructions.text: Remove from heat and serve your Healthyfied Soy Veggies hot. Enjoy your high-fiber, healthified dish!
recipeInstructions.name: Step 8
